Text: This is update 4. What the scene called update 4 was actually update 3.1 since all it added was Large Adress Aware which made it possible for the game to see and use more than 4 GB RAM.
Yes I know, just refering to the fact that Bethsoft calls this update 4 not 5. Whichever scene group that released the Large Adress Aware patch a month ago misnamed it update 4.

http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Patch

read there. according to that, and not counting the varied Beta patch. this is the 5th update for skyrim, so it can be safely called update 5. Bethsoft also never say this as update 4 or 5, they refer is as update 1.4.

happy now ?
5th update = game becomes v1.4.21. very easy to understand

Thanks.

I haven't played this game yet, but great to see updates are coming.
why does my skyrim laggs, i have the required hardwares. :/
this patch introduces micro-stuttering for a lot of people, nothing your hardware can do really
